description: This Python source file demonstrates how to implement human-in-the-loop functionality with external tool execution in an agent framework. It defines a tool for executing shell commands asynchronously, sets up an agent with this tool, runs a command to list directory files, and handles external execution of the tool within an asynchronous flow.

methods.name: execute_shell_command
methods.description: A tool function that executes a shell command if it starts with 'ls', returning its output, otherwise raises an exception.
